title: More Training Camp Whispers & Cowboys Hard Knocks Recap
itunes:title: More Training Camp Whispers & Cowboys Hard Knocks Recap
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, and Gregg Rosenthal spin through training camp whispers around the league starting with the Ravens (5:20). Marc gets very upset while cut off during his Joe Burrow discussion (13:30) and Green Bay's David Bakhtiari might not be ready for week 1. (16:10). Patrick Robinson retires from he Saints (29:40) and the Chargers seem to be trending in the right direction when it comes to fans (33:21). Cameron Wolfe joins the show to discuss the Dolphins (40:15) and the heroes recap the first episode of Hard Knocks with the Dallas Cowboys (52:53).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
